description: Dashboard for Trickster delta cache for TSDBs

panels.description:
Shows percentage of query cache hit or miss of Trickster. 
For more info about cache success see graph info on the right.
panels.title: Cache hit/miss

panels.description:
Shows percentage and count of queried points found of not in Trickster cache.

- cached = found in cache
- uncached = not found in cache

**The more cached the better.**

targets.expr:
sum(increase(trickster_proxy_points_total{$trickster_label_name=~"$trickster_label_value", instance=~"$instance", origin_name=~"$origin_name", origin_type=~"$origin_type"}[$aggregation_interval])) by (cache_status)
/ on () group_left ()
sum(increase(trickster_proxy_points_total{$trickster_label_name=~"$trickster_label_value", instance=~"$instance", origin_name=~"$origin_name", origin_type=~"$origin_type"}[$aggregation_interval]))

panels.title: Percentage of cache hit

panels.description:
Shows percentage of query cache hit or miss of Trickster. 
For more info about cache success see graph info on the right.
panels.title: Cache hit/miss

panels.description:
Shows percentage and count of queried points found of not in Trickster cache.

- cached = found in cache
- uncached = not found in cache

**The more cached the better.**

targets.expr:
sum(increase(trickster_proxy_requests_total{$trickster_label_name=~"$trickster_label_value", instance=~"$instance", origin_name=~"$origin_name", origin_type=~"$origin_type"}[$aggregation_interval])) by (cache_status)
/ on () group_left()
sum(increase(trickster_proxy_requests_total{$trickster_label_name=~"$trickster_label_value", instance=~"$instance", origin_name=~"$origin_name", origin_type=~"$origin_type"}[$aggregation_interval]))

panels.title: Percentage of cache hit

panels.description:
Total count of requests aggregated by instance.
Shows how are the requests balanced.
panels.title: Total requests by instance

panels.description:
Shows how long the requests took to be served as histogram using quantiles. This means that x% was served faster than the value of the metric.
That means:
- 50%: shows time before 50% of requests was served
- 90%: shows time before 90% of requests was served
- 99%: shows time before 99% of requests was served
panels.title: Proxy request duration

panels.description:
Shows total query count aggregated by type.
There are two types;
- query: instant query resulting in data in given time
- query_range: query for data in given time interval
panels.title: Total requests by type

panels.description:
Shows total query count aggregated by type.
There are two types;
- query: instant query resulting in data in given time
- query_range: query for data in given time interval
panels.title: Total requests by type

panels.description:
This shows how long did it take  Prometheus to server requests.
This could be possibly lower time when using Trickster since the queries can be for smaller more recent time range.
panels.title: Prometheus Query elapsed time

panels.description: Shows total request count on Prometheus server.
panels.title: Prometheus Request count

panels.description: Shows duration how long it takes to Prometheus to server requests aggregated by handlers
panels.title: Prometheus request duration histogram

title: Trickster
